translations: adj.忘恩负义的，不知感恩的

sentences.sentence: "Ingrates!" says the garment, "I protected you in inclement weather."
sentences.translation: 衣服说：“你这忘恩负义的人！”我在风雨中保护过你。

sentences.sentence: Satan represents kindness to those who deserve it instead of love wasted on ingrates.
sentences.translation: 撒旦主张将仁慈给与应得其之人，而不是将爱浪费在忘恩负义的人身上。

sentences.sentence: If you neglect them, the bleating ingrates may glower at you or even have the nerve to die off!
sentences.translation: 如果你忽视它们的叫声，忘恩负义，它甚至会怒目而视的死亡！
